org.araneaframework.uilib.tree
Interface TreeDataProvider

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface TreeDataProvider
extends java.io.Serializable

Tree data provider is used by TreeWidget to retrieve tree data.

Since:
1.0.7
Author:
Alar Kvell (alar@araneaframework.org)

Method Summary
 java.util.List getChildren(TreeNodeContext parent)
          Returns a list of child nodes for specified parent node.
 boolean hasChildren(TreeNodeContext parent)
          Returns if the specified tree node has any children.
 

Method Detail

getChildren

public java.util.List getChildren(TreeNodeContext parent)
Returns a list of child nodes for specified parent node.

Parameters:
parent - tree node whose children will be returned. Root node of the tree (TreeWidget) has no display widget.
Returns:
list of TreeNodeWidgets. May return null instead of empty list.

hasChildren

public boolean hasChildren(TreeNodeContext parent)
Returns if the specified tree node has any children.

Parameters:
parent - tree node which will be checked for existence of child nodes.
Returns:
if the specified tree node has any children.
